196: What can I do when CyberLink PhotoDirector crashes on a platform that is installed with the 3rd party Duet Display program?

有安装第三方 Duet Display 程序的用户可能有过讯连科技相片大师崩溃的经历。
198: According to our engineering team's investigation, after the 3rd-party program is installed, it alternates the Windows graphics components and display configuration, which obstructs other program's (e.g. PhotoDirector) use of the Windows graphics function.
根据工程团队的調查安装第三方程序后它会替换 Windows 图形组件和显示配置妨碍其它程序例如相片大师使用 Windows 图形功能。
199: To resolve the crash issue, you are advised to uninstall the 3rd-party program (Duet Display) before launching PhotoDirector.

201: Uninstall the 3rd-party Duet Display program from Windows Control Panel > Programs.
从 [Windows 控制面板] > [程序] 卸载第三方 Duet Display 程序。
203: After reboot, launch PhotoDirector to check if it resolves the crash error.
重启后启动相片大师检查是否解决了崩溃错误。
204: If the crash issue persists, or you haven't installed the Duet Display 3rd-party program, please contact CyberLink technical support for further assistance.

657: How do I use Denoise to reduce the grainy condition in my photos in CyberLink PhotoDirector 14/365?
如何在讯连科技相片大师 14/365 中使用“去噪”来减少照片画面上的颗粒
658: CyberLink PhotoDirector 14/365 now includes the Denoise tool that utilizes AI technology to remove noise and reduce the grainy condition in your photos in the Guided module.
讯连科技相片大师 14/365 现已将 AI 技术使用于“去噪”工具以在“导向”模块中移除杂色及减少照片画面上的颗粒。
659: The feature is optimized for photos not shot under ideal lighting condition but using high ISO values on cameras.
此功能针对拍摄时现场照明状况不理想并在相机上使用高 ISO 值的照片进行优化调整。
660: Follow these steps to use the Denoise tool in a photo:
请按照以下步骤在照片中使用“去噪”工具
661: Select a photo in the photo browser panel and then click Guided.
在照片浏览器面板中选择一张照片，然后单击导向。
662: When the calculation is complete, you can adjust the strength of denoise effect if required.
计算完成后您可以按需调整去噪效果的强度。
663: How do I use the Style feature in CyberLink PhotoDirector 14/365?
如何使用讯连科技相片大师 14/365 的“风格”功能
666: Exclusive Background Music (for Slideshow Video Creation)
独家背景音乐 (用于创建幻灯片视频)

应用于照片的色彩查找表 (LUT)
672: 全景照片、多重曝光照片创建
674: * Maximum free downloads of premium images is 30 per month for each subscription account.

675: 从视频创建 GIF 动画
676: The premium content is only available to download and use in CyberLink PhotoDirector 365 during the subscription period.
尊享版图像素材仅供在订阅期间下载并用于讯连科技相片大师 365。

为什么我不能在图像上应用 AI 风格特效的“卡通风格”和“动画风格”

您的设备必须满足以下最低硬件要求，才能运行这些特效。

690: How do I use the Enlarge Photo feature in CyberLink PhotoDirector 365?
如何在讯连科技相片大师 365 中使用“放大照片”的功能
691: The new version of PhotoDirector 365 (released after Dec. 2022) supports the Enlarge Photo feature, which uses AI processing1 to enlarge and upscale your photos from their original size2.
2022 年 12 月之后发布的新版相片大师 365 支持“放大照片”功能，该功能使用 AI 处理1将您的照片从原始尺寸2放大并升级。
692: Follow the steps below to use the feature:
请按照以下步骤使用此功能
693: Select a photo to edit in your Library.
在您的“图库”中选择要编辑的照片。
694: Right click on the photo to open the context menu, and then select Enlarge Photo.
右键单击照片以打开上下文菜单，然后选择放大照片。
695: Select the enlarge amount3 (the maximum is 4x) in the Enlarge Photo editing window.
在“放大照片”编辑窗口中选择放大量3 (最大 4 倍)。
696: Click OK to process and export the enlarged photo.
单击确定以处理并导出放大的照片。
697: The enlarged photo will be saved as a PNG image file, and imported into your PhotoDirector Library automatically.
放大的照片会保存为 PNG 图像文件并自动导入到相片大师“图库”。
698: It will be positioned next to your original photo in the photo browser panel.
在照片浏览器面板中该图像文件会位于您的原始照片旁。
700: The AI-assisted feature requires Windows 10 OS or above versions.
AI 协助功能需要 Windows 10 或以上版本的操作系统
701: It is not supported on the legacy Windows 7/8/8.1 platforms.
旧版 Windows 7/8/8.1 平台不支持。
702: The maximum photo size that supports up-scaling is 2,000x 2,000 pixels.
支持放大的照片大小最大为 2,000 x 2,000 像素。
703: The larger you want the new photo to be, the more RAM (memory) on your platform you'll need to process the photo enlargement.
您想要的新照片越大平台会需要更多的 RAM (内存) 来处理照片放大。
705: To learn more about the features in PhotoDirector, please refer to the video tutorials in the CyberLink Learning Center.
要了解更多有关相片大师的功能，请参阅讯连科技教学中心的视频教程。
707: I cannot find the Export/Save as/Save button after updating to the new version of CyberLink PhotoDirector 365 (released after Dec 2022).
在更新到 2022 年 12 月之后发布的新版讯连科技相片大师 365 后找不到“导出”/“另存为”/“保存”按钮。
708: How do I save or export edited photos in CyberLink PhotoDirector 365?
如何保存或导出在讯连科技相片大师 365 中编辑的照片
709: In the new version of PhotoDirector 365 (released after Dec. 2022), the original Export/Save as/Save button in the Library, Adjustment, Guided, and Edit modules has been re-located and replaced with the new Export button at the top of PhotoDirector program window.
在 2022 年 12 月之后发布的新版相片大师 365 中，图库、调整、导向和编辑模块中原来的导出/另存为/保存按钮已调动，并用相片大师程序窗口顶部的新导出按钮替代。
710: After you've edited your photos in any module above, you may click the Export button at the top of PhotoDirector program window to export or save your editing.
在上述任意模块中编辑照片后，您可以单击相片大师程序窗口顶部的导出按钮来导出或保存编辑内容。
712: I cannot find the Express Mode after updating to the new version of CyberLink PhotoDirector 14/365 (released after Dec 2022).
在更新到 2022 年 12 月之后发布的新版讯连科技相片大师 14/365 后找不到“快捷模式”。
714: In the new version of PhotoDirector 365 (released after Dec. 2022), the Express Mode has been removed and replaced with a new launcher.
在 2022 年 12 月之后发布的新版相片大师 365 中，已删除快捷模式，并用新的启动面板替代。
715: You can now click the button to select photos from your personal folder, or drag and drop your photo files from your desktop/file explorer to the new launcher.
您现在可以单击 按钮从个人文件夹选择照片，或将照片文件从桌面/文件资源管理器拖放到新的启动程序。
716: Then, you can start editing them directly in the full featured Library/Adjustment/Guided/Edit module.
然后您可以开始在功能完整的图库/调整/导向/编辑模块中直接编辑。
717: How do I use the Black Mist feature in CyberLink PhotoDirector 365?
如何在讯连科技相片大师 365 中使用“黑柔滤镜”的功能
718: The new version of PhotoDirector 365 (released after Apr. 2023) supports the Black Mist feature, which is a filter effect that suppresses highlights and shadow contrast in your photos to create a blurry and soft atmosphere.
2023 年 4 月之后发布的新版相片大师 365 支持“黑柔滤镜”功能该功能为滤镜效果通过压制照片中高亮和阴影的对比度来制造模糊、柔和的氛围。
719: Click Edit on PhotoDirector launcher, and then select a photo to edit in the Guided module.
单击相片大师启动面板的编辑，然后选择照片在导向模块中编辑。
720: Or, select a photo from your PhotoDirector Library, right click on the photo to open the context menu, and then select Edit > Guided to enter the module.
或者，从相片大师图库中选择照片，右键单击照片以打开上下文菜单，然后选择编辑 > 导向进入该模块。
721: Select the Black Mist tool under the Lens Filter Effects tab.
选择镜头滤镜效果选项卡下的黑柔滤镜工具。
722: Adjust the effect by selecting a density preset and the other filter attributes:
如果需要选择预设密度和更多滤镜属性来调整该特效
723: Threshold, Strength, and Softness if required.
724: Click the Export button to save the edited photo.
单击导出按钮来保存编辑后的照片。
725: How do I use the Face Shaper feature in CyberLink PhotoDirector 365?
如何在讯连科技相片大师 365 中使用“塑脸”的功能
726: The new version of PhotoDirector 365 (released after Apr. 2023) supports more face adjustment options in the Face Shaper feature.
2023 年 4 月之后发布的新版相片大师 365 支持更多塑脸功能的脸部调整选项。
727: Now, you can adjust the shape of Face, Eyebrows, Eyes, Nose, and Lips on faces separately.
您现在可以单独调整脸部、眉毛、眼睛、鼻子和嘴唇的形状。
728: Select the Face Tools feature under the People Beautifier tab, and then click Face Shaper.
选择人物修饰器选项卡下的脸部工具功能，然后单击塑脸。
729: 如果需要选择要编辑的区域
730: Face, Eyebrows, Eyes, Nose, or Lips, then adjust the width, position, and other shape details if required.
脸部、眉毛、眼睛、鼻子或嘴唇，然后调整宽度、位置和更多细节。
731: I cannot find the Save as/Save button after updating to the new version of CyberLink PhotoDirector 365 (released after Dec. 2022).
在更新到 2022 年 12 月之后发布的新版讯连科技相片大师 365 后找不到“另存为”/“保存”按钮。
732: In the new version of PhotoDirector 365 (released after Dec. 2022), the original Save as/Save button in the Library, Adjust, Guided, and Expert (previously known as Edit) modules has been re-located and replaced with the new Export button at the top left side of PhotoDirector program window.
在 2022 年 12 月之后发布的新版相片大师 365 中，图库、调整、导向和专业编辑 (之前称为“编辑”) 模块中原来的另存为/保存按钮已调动，并用相片大师程序窗口的左上方的新导出按钮替代。
733: After you've edited your photos in any module above, you may click the Export button at the top of PhotoDirector program window to save your editing.
在上述任意模块中编辑照片后，您可以单击相片大师程序窗口顶部的导出按钮来保存编辑内容。
734: If you would like to export your edited photos using the advanced export dialog in the Library and Adjust modules like what you did in previous PhotoDirector version, you can select the photos you are going to export first.
如果您要在图库和调整模块中，使用高级导出的对话框来导出编辑后的照片 (如同在旧版本的相片大师中的操作)，您可以先选择要导出的照片。
735: Then, click the File > Export Selected Photos option on the title bar to export your photos.
然后，单击标题栏上的文件 > 导出所选的照片选项来导出您的照片。
736: The launcher of CyberLink PhotoDirector 365 has been re-designed in the new version that released after Apr. 2023. How do I enter the Library, Adjustment (Adjust), Guided, Expert (previously known as Edit), and Create modules in the new version of CyberLink PhotoDirector 365?
2023 年 4 月之后发布的新版讯连科技相片大师 365 的启动面板已重新设计。如何进入新版讯连科技相片大师 365 的“图库”、“调整”、“导向”、“专业编辑”(之前称为“编辑”) 和“创建”模块
737: In the new version of PhotoDirector 365 (released after Apr. 2023), the program launcher has been redesigned with two new modes:
在 2023 年 4 月之后发布的新版相片大师 365 中程序的启动面板已重新设计為两种新模式
738: Organize and Adjust and Edit as below:

908: Why does the AI Avatar not look like me?
为什么 AI 虚拟人像看上去不像我
909: AI analyzes the 10-20 photos you upload to generate avatars, so the shooting angle, background, and any subject appearing in the photo will affect the similarity between the AI Avatar and yourself.
AI 分析您上传的 10-20 张照片来生成头像因此摄影角度、背景和任何出现在照片中的对象将影响 AI 虚拟人像和您自己之间的相似度。
910: It is recommended that you look toward the camera in the photos provided, and avoid exaggerated expressions and makeup.
建议您提供面朝相机、表情和妆容不夸张的照片。
911: The higher the quality of the photos, the better the effect and resulting avatars.
照片的质量越高，生成的头像效果越好。
912: However, the instability of the AI algorithm, some generated avatars may still have results that are not taht similar to the real person.
但是由于 AI 算法的不稳定部分生成的头像仍可能有与真人不相似的结果。
914: Why is there noise in the AI Avatar?
为什么 AI 虚拟人像有杂色
915: AI analyzes the 10-20 photos you upload to generate an avatar, so the background and any subject appearing in the photo will affect the generated image quality.
AI 分析您上传的 10-20 张照片来生成头像因此摄影背景和任何出现在照片中的对象将影响生成的图像质量。
916: It is recommended in the photos you provide photos with many different backgrounds, so the AI has more information it can refer to.
建议您提供多个不同的背景照片，以便 AI 有更多信息可以参考。
917: The higher the quality of the photos, the better the results will be.
照片的质量越高，生成的结果越好。
918: However, the instability of the AI algorithm, some generated avatars may still contain some noise.
但是由于 AI 算法的不稳定部分生成的头像仍可能包含一些杂色。
919: Why does the AI Avatar looks unnatural or has an unexpected result?
为什么 AI 虚拟人像看上去不自然或含有非预期的结果
920: Each style is released after multiple adjustments.
每个风格都在多次调整后推出的。
921: We will do our best to ensure that the AI Avatar does not appear deformed, have skin color changes, and is not overexposed, unnatural, or in other unexpected situations.
我们将尽力确保 AI 虚拟人像不出现变形、皮肤颜色的更改、曝光过度、不自然，或其它非预期的情况。
922: However, the instability of the AI algorithm, some generated avatars may still have the above and other unexpected results.
但是，由于 AI 算法的不稳定，部分生成的头像仍可能有上述和其它非预期的结果。
924: What should I do if I see warning "Uh oh, an error has occurred." after clicking on purchased avatars?
如果在单击购买的头像后，看到警告“糟糕，出现错误”时，应该怎么办？
925: Please take a screenshot of the page containing the error message, describe how you encountered, and upload this screenshot to our support team through the "Send Feedback" in "FAQ & Send Feedback" in the settings menu, and we will assist you with this problem.
请屏幕截图包含错误信息的页面说明您的遭遇并在“设置”菜单中的“常见问题解答 & 发送反馈”通过“发送反馈”上传此屏幕截图给我们的支持团队我们将帮助您解决此问题。
927: Will the images I provide to generate AI Avatars in PhotoDirector Mobile be stored on the server?
我在相片大师行动版中提供用于生成 AI 虚拟人像的图像，会存储在服务器上？
928: The images you upload and the derived biometric information will only be used as a reference source for the AI to analyze and create your avatars.
您上传的图像和派生的生物特征信息将仅提供 AI 作为参考资源，以便分析并创建您的头像，
929: They will not be used for other purposes.
930: The uploaded images will be automatically deleted by the system 24 hours after you upload them.
系统会在您上传图像后的 24 小时将其自动删除。

我购买的 AI 虚拟人像会存储在服务器上多长时间
933: After you purchase the AI Avatars, you will get 3 years of free storage automatically.
在购买 AI 虚拟人像后，您将自动获得 3 年免费的存储空间。
934: You can delete them permanently from the server anytime.
您可以随时从服务器将其删除。
935: To do so, long-press the entire pack of purchased AI Avatars to see the "Permanent Delete" option.
若要执行此操作，请长按购买的整包 AI 虚拟人像，可看到“永久删除”选项。
936: Please note that there is no way to retrieve these AI Avatars after permanent deletion.
请注意永久删除后将无法检索这些 AI 虚拟人像。
